metadataAttributes.Title: Financial Accounting: Advanced Topics
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this course, you will explore advanced topics in financial accounting. You will start your journey with accounting for assets with more than one-year life. You will learn in detail how firms account for fixed assets. You will then move to financing of assets and discuss accounting for liabilities. The course will continue with an in-depth exploration of shareholders’ equity. Finally, you will critically evaluate preparation, components, and analysis of cash flows statement.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cash Flow,Financial Accounting,Cash Flow Statement,Financial Statement,
